name: Inconvo
headline: The Ask-AI API for customer-facing analytics
description:
Inconvo makes it easy for developers to add Ask AI for customer-facing analytics so that users can ask questions on their data in natural language.

With Inconvo shipping AI-first analytics is easy, simply send a user question to our API which responds with a chart, table or text. 

Inconvo connects to your database to automatically retrieve the right data to answer your users’ questions. Then, you’re in charge of presenting the responses to your users in a way that fits your design.

Inconvo is purpose-built to overcome the challenges of AI for customer-facing analytics, providing tools that handle multi-tenancy, database access control, AI evaluation, and a semantic layer that maps business terms to database labels.

#  Ask AI for customer-facing analytics 
Inconvo makes it easy for developers to add Ask AI for customer-facing analytics so that users can ask questions on their data in natural language. One API, that delivers answers in text, chart, or table format. 
[ Request Demo ](https://inconvo.ai/</request-demo>) [ Read the docs ](https://inconvo.ai/</request-demo>)
![Inconvo logo](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/yc.QvUp6Lc7_Z1cKeQz.svg)
Backed by Y Combinator

##  A simple, elegant API that fits with your stack. 
Enhance your users' data analysis experience with top-tier conversational AI. 
Chart  Text  Table 
Request 
POST  https://app.inconvo.ai/api/ask 
```
{
 "question": 
  "How many products have I sold per day of the week?",
 "conversationId": "conv_c9b1d",
 "requestContext": {
  "userId": "user_d7adc",
  "orgId": "org_99548"
 }
}
```

Response API  Render 
200 OK 
200 OK 
```
{
  "type": "bar_chart",
  "message": 
    "Here's a breakdown of the number of 
    products sold per day of the week.",
  "chartData": {
   "data": [
    {
     "label": "Monday",
     "value": 8
    },
    {
     "label": "Tuesday",
     "value": 8
    },
    {
     "label": "Wednesday",
     "value": 10
    },
    {
     "label": "Thursday",
     "value": 12
    },
    {
     "label": "Friday",
     "value": 10
    },
    {
     "label": "Saturday",
     "value": 10
    },
    {
     "label": "Sunday",
     "value": 6
    }
   ],
   "title": "Movies Rented Per Day of the Week",
   "xLabel": "Day of the Week",
   "yLabel": "Number of Movies Rented"
  }
}
```

Request 
POST  https://app.inconvo.ai/api/ask 
```
{
 "question": 
  "How many products have 
  we sold over the last 6 months",
 "conversationId": "conv_c9b1d",
 "requestContext": {
  "userId": "user_d7adc",
  "orgId": "org_99548"
 }
}
```

Response API  Render 
200 OK 
You have sold 293 product over the last 6 months. 
200 OK 
```
{
 "type": "text",
 "message": 
  "You have sold 293 product over the last 6 months."
}
```

Request 
POST  https://app.inconvo.ai/api/ask 
```
{
 "question": 
  "What were my top 5 selling products last quarter?",
 "conversationId": "conv_c9b1d",
 "requestContext": {
  "userId": "user_d7adc",
  "orgId": "org_99548"
 }
}
```

Response API  Render 
200 OK 
Product Name | #Sold | Revenue | Profit  
---|---|---|---  
Mac Mini | 300 | $3000 | $600  
Nvidia Digits | 250 | $2500 | $500  
Mac Studio | 200 | $2000 | $400  
Raspberry Pi 4 | 150 | $1500 | $300  
Vector One | 100 | $1000 | $200  
200 OK 
```
{
  "type": "table",
  "message": "Here's a breakdown of the product sales data.",
  "tableData": {
    "columnNames": [
      "Product Name", "#Sold", "Revenue", "Profit"
    ],
    "body": [
      { "Product Name": "Mac Mini", "#Sold": 300, "Revenue": "$3000", "Profit": "$600" },
      { "Product Name": "Nvidia Digits", "#Sold": 250, "Revenue": "$2500", "Profit": "$500" },
      { "Product Name": "Mac Studio", "#Sold": 200, "Revenue": "$2000", "Profit": "$400" },
      { "Product Name": "Raspberry Pi 4", "#Sold": 150, "Revenue": "$1500", "Profit": "$300" },
      { "Product Name": "Vector One", "#Sold": 100, "Revenue": "$1000", "Profit": "$200" }
    ]
  }
}
```

##  How Inconvo works 
We use your existing data to enable reliable and production-ready Ask AI for customer-facing analytics. 
Step 1 
#####  Connect your Data Source 
Connect with your existing data sources to retrieve data for Ask AI. 
![database logo](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/pglogo.ls55zSko_I66I2.svg)
Postgres 
![database logo](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/mysql.Dz2PGGhb_I66I2.svg)
MySQL 
![database logo](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/bigquery.CcoQXLgJ_I66I2.svg)
BigQuery 
![database logo](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/supabase.CDx12vJ1_I66I2.svg)
Supabase 
![database logo](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/mariadb.Dd-0bS1v_I66I2.svg)
MariaDB 
![database logo](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/clickhouse.CBv39DL5_I66I2.svg)
ClickHouse 
Step 2 
#####  Deploy Ask AI 
Deploy Ask AI via our API and use it where users have questions on their analytics (e.g. Dashboards, Reports, Chatbots). 
Ask AI 
Step 3 
#####  Turn Chats Into Insights 
Optimize your customer-facing analytics, enhance user experience and drive product decisions with insights. 
# 2.4k
#  140%
## Answered questions
# 748 hours
## Analysis time eliminated
##  Manage your Ask AI on the Inconvo platform 
Use the self-service platform to explore, control and evaluate Ask AI. 
#  Explore 
Use the API playground to run queries, provide feedback and add examples to your evaluation dataset. 
![product image](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/playground.D6RBgwIq_Z1yDgGw.svg)
#  Control access 
Take full control over the tables and columns that your AI can query. 
![product image](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/database.C84tPYrZ_Z1axaxQ.webp)
#  Tailor to your data 
Curate a dataset of queries based on your users' questions to test accuracy before deployment. 
![product image](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/eval-dataset.DurcPuEK_Z1yDgGw.svg)
#  Understand performance 
See exactly how well your Ask AI can answer user questions. 
![product image](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/eval-run.BW3dRW7t_Z1yDgGw.svg)
##  Accuracy is everything 
We optimize Inconvo for one thing: providing the most accurate answers to your users questions about customer-facing analytics. 
![product image](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/unsure.CQNFINFy_jWvTB.svg)
#  Knows when to say "I Don't Know" 
Accepts when data to answer the question is unavailable and only answers questions related to retrieval from the connected datasource. 
![product image](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/tick.7FS_FDoA_jWvTB.svg)
#  Always responds factually 
Infers user intent, but always answer factually - outlining any assumptions for easy correction on follow up questions. 
![product image](https://inconvo.ai/_astro/refresh.B2fN1G7e_jWvTB.svg)
#  Responsive to your data 
Generates data retrieval queries dynamically and remains accurate even as your analytics evolve. 
##  Ready to empower your users with Ask AI? 
[Request Demo ](https://inconvo.ai/</request-demo>)

generated_description:
**Inconvo:** Simplifying Customer-Facing Analytics with AI

Founded in 2023 and based in Limerick, Ireland, Inconvo is a developer-focused startup that’s part of Y Combinator’s S23 batch. It offers an innovative Ask-AI API specifically designed for customer-facing analytics, enabling users to query their data in plain, conversational language.

### Mission and Functionality
Inconvo aims to make it effortless for developers to integrate conversational AI functionality into their applications. Imagine being able to ask questions about your sales, customer engagement, or any data set just like you would chat with a person. Inconvo’s API processes these requests and delivers responses in varied formats, be it a chart, table, or plain text. 

Here’s how it works:
1. **Connect Your Data**: Inconvo seamlessly connects to your existing databases, whether it’s Postgres, MySQL, or others. This means you don’t have to implement a new database; they simply work with what you have.
  
2. **Deploy Ask AI**: Once integrated, you can deploy the AI capabilities in your apps, allowing end-users to interact with their data intuitively.

3. **Analyze and Optimize**: With answers ready at users' fingertips, businesses can enhance analytics, improve user experiences, and drive data-informed decisions.

### Unique Selling Points
- **Multi-tenancy & Access Control**: Inconvo is built to handle multiple users and secure access, making it suitable for a range of applications.
- **Semantic Layer**: The API translates business jargon into database terms, simplifying the technicalities for developers and users alike.
- **Accuracy & Reliability**: Inconvo places a high premium on accuracy. It dynamically generates queries, acknowledges when it can’t answer a question, and continually adapts as analytics evolve.

### Current Status
As of now, Inconvo is in private beta, showcasing its potential to streamline customer analytics drastically. The small team of two keeps the operations agile, relying on insights from their Group Partner, Dalton Caldwell, to guide their strategic direction.

### Join the Journey
For developers eager to provide a cutting-edge analytics experience to their users with just a few lines of code, Inconvo seems like a promising solution. If you’re interested in seeing it in action, you can request a demo through their website: [Inconvo.ai](https://inconvo.ai).

Inconvo is positioned to reshape how businesses interact with their data, making it not just about accumulating metrics, but really understanding the story behind every number.
